channel.title: Birthed by the Necrophage
channel.description: Recent content on Birthed by the Necrophage

item.title: Session 11
item.description:
Session Date: 4/22/2017

The party has decided to ascend an Eldish tower and commandeer a bubble car, guarded by a single Eldish warrior. This turns out to be more difficult than it looks.

item.title: Campaign Map
item.description: Google Maps version Visited Hexes of Note 43.44 Lemetaro, villaged saved from the Emerald Enchanter. 41.44 Citadel of the Emerald Enchanter. He’s dead now. (or is he?) 39.43 Head-hunters! 36.42 The ruins of the Lapis Observatory.

item.title: Important Loot
item.description: An Eldish bubble car. Currently unlocked capabilities: Vertical ascension Map from the Emerald Enchanter with four areas marked A very nice Wand of Cure Wounds that might be more than it seems Plasma Torch, currently out of fuel

item.title: Player Characters
item.description: Flynn the Fortunate Magicky half-elf from the elf city. Mavus the Wolf Former pit-fighter, master of polearms. Ovek the Tall Jungle gnome psionicist. Grimbok the Henchman Half-beastman barbarian.

item.title: Session 10 (maybe)
item.description:
Session Date: 3/25/2017

Fresh off their successful home invasion of the EMERALD ENCHANTER, intrepid Thulian adventurers Flynn the Fortunate, Marvus the Wolf, and Ovek the Tall, along with their loyal half-beast henchman Grimbok, head into the JUNGLE OF BURA for some routine archaeological looting. Unfortunately, the targeted structure –ruins of the elvish LAPIS OBSERVATORY– is found to be currently occupied by the ELD, and the party is sucked into an INTERDIMENSIONAL RIFT (It was Ovek’s fault.)
